title: MedicationAdministration data model based on HL7 equivalent resource
description: Smart Data Models for MedicationAdministration HL7/FHIR resource type

resourceType.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/'. This is a MedicationAdministration resource

meta.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Meta'. The metadata about a resource. This is content in the resource that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content might not always be associated with version changes to the resource.

implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/uri'. String of characters used to identify a name or a resource

_implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

language.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/code'. A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_language.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

text.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Narrative'. A human-readable summary of the resource conveying the essential clinical and business information for the resource.

contained.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/ResourceList'. These resources do not have an independent existence apart from the resource that contains them - they cannot be identified independently, and nor can they have their own independent transaction scope.

extension.description: Relationship. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Extension'. May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance  applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer can define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension.

items.description: Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

modifierExtension.description:
Relationship. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Extension'. May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource and that modifies the understanding of the element that contains it and/or the understanding of the containing element's descendants. Usually modifier elements provide negation or qualification. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension. Applications processing a resource are required to check for modifier extensions.

Modifier extensions SHALL NOT change the meaning of any elements on Resource or DomainResource (including cannot change the meaning of modifierExtension itself).

items.description: Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

identifier.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Identifier'. Identifiers associated with this Medication Administration that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate. They are business identifiers assigned to this resource by the performer or other systems and remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

items.description: An identifier - identifies some entity uniquely and unambiguously. Typically this is used for business identifiers.

instantiates.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/uri'. A protocol, guideline, orderset, or other definition that was adhered to in whole or in part by this event.

items.description: String of characters used to identify a name or a resource
Base definition for all elements in a resource.

partOf.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. A larger event of which this particular event is a component or step.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

status.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/code'. A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_status.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

statusReason.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/CodeableConcept'. A code indicating why the administration was not performed.

items.description: A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

category.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/CodeableConcept'. A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

medicationCodeableConcept.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/CodeableConcept'. A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

medicationReference.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. A reference from one resource to another.

subject.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. A reference from one resource to another.

context.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. A reference from one resource to another.

supportingInformation.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. Additional information (for example, patient height and weight) that supports the administration of the medication.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

effectiveDateTime.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/'. A specific date/time or interval of time during which the administration took place (or did not take place, when the 'notGiven' attribute is true). For many administrations, such as swallowing a tablet the use of dateTime is more appropriate.

_effectiveDateTime.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

effectivePeriod.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Period'. A time period defined by a start and end date and optionally time.

performer.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/MedicationAdministration_Performer'. Indicates who or what performed the medication administration and how they were involved.

items.description: Describes the event of a patient consuming or otherwise being administered a medication.  This may be as simple as swallowing a tablet or it may be a long running infusion.  Related resources tie this event to the authorizing prescription, and the specific encounter between patient and health care practitioner.

reasonCode.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/CodeableConcept'. A code indicating why the medication was given.

items.description: A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

reasonReference.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. Condition or observation that supports why the medication was administered.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

request.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. A reference from one resource to another.

device.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. The device used in administering the medication to the patient.  For example, a particular infusion pump.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

note.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Annotation'. Extra information about the medication administration that is not conveyed by the other attributes.

items.description: A  text note which also  contains information about who made the statement and when.

dosage.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/MedicationAdministration_Dosage'. Describes the event of a patient consuming or otherwise being administered a medication.  This may be as simple as swallowing a tablet or it may be a long running infusion.  Related resources tie this event to the authorizing prescription, and the specific encounter between patient and health care practitioner.

eventHistory.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. A summary of the events of interest that have occurred, such as when the administration was verified.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be 'MedicationAdministration'
